title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
OB: When switching perspectives from the Java perspective to the Resource perspective and then back to the Java perspective, the CVS repository view loses its maximized state.
EB: The CVS repository view should retain its maximized state when switching perspectives.
SR: To reproduce:  1. Open the CVS repository view in the Java perspective.  2. Double click the title bar to maximize it.  3. Switch to the Resource perspective.  4. Come back to the Java perspective.
